title: Support ticket is gone
body: I recently created a support ticket that seems to have vanished from my list of created tickets, along with any documentation of the support tickets I've submitted over the last year.  Is this some kind of known error with the support pages that is being worked on? Should I submit another ticket for this or just leave it be?

replies.body: The site was changed a while back to require you to log in, and store those tickets to that specific account.  You'll want to make sure you're logged into the correct account, but I can check on your ticket was well.  Do you have a ticket number handy?
So it's been a few days and nothing has changed, do you have any insight into the problem?

Hey there, sorry this is still going on.  I'm not really sure to be honest, but our account team can take a look.  Hit us up in an email instead, and we'll see if any wires got crossed: support@riotgames.com.

I don't have the ticket number, and I logged in about a week or two ago for a different support ticket and everything was fine. I logged in and submitted the ticket, and I was able to see my history of tickets sent over the last few years. When I checked today I logged in to the same place but the only tickets that were present were two that I submitted and were completed more than a year ago. Nothing about the unanswered ticket nor any of the one I had answered from 2017.
